result.title: NEMO Expert panel events (6 workshops during project)
result.description: Related to task 8.2.2. CATA, supported by KU Leuven, will set up a high-level multi-stakeholder expert panel. A total of 6 meetings is foreseen. This high-level group is to include persons from not only industry Associations and Technology Platforms, academia and public authorities but especially also from international NGO’s like WWF, Friends of the Earth, Greenpeace who, in general, take a relatively critical stance towards primary mining, in view of certain, “not-so-responsible mining” examples in China, Africa and Latin America.
